content.metaTitle: Villa Lotus Jávea - €1.55M Sea View Villa | Cap Martí
content.metaDescription: Luxury 3-bedroom Villa Lotus in Cap Martí, Jávea. €1,550,000. Panoramic sea views, 1000m² plot, pool. Premium Costa Blanca location near golf course.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Lotus, an architectural masterpiece that epitomizes luxury living in one of Jávea's most coveted locations. Perched in an elevated position in the prestigious Cap Martí area, this stunning 3-bedroom villa offers breathtaking panoramic views of both the Mediterranean Sea and the dramatic Montgó mountains, creating a truly exceptional living environment.

With 235m² of meticulously designed interior space set on a generous 1000m² plot, Villa Lotus seamlessly blends contemporary elegance with functional luxury. Every detail has been carefully crafted to maximize the spectacular surroundings while providing the ultimate in comfort and privacy for discerning buyers seeking an extraordinary Costa Blanca residence.

locationSection.intro:
Cap Martí represents the pinnacle of luxury living in Jávea, offering an exclusive residential enclave that combines tranquil privacy with convenient access to the area's finest amenities. This elevated location provides residents with some of the most spectacular views along the Costa Blanca, while maintaining easy access to Jávea's beautiful beaches, vibrant town center, and world-class dining establishments.

The El Tossalet - Pinomar area is renowned for its sophisticated residential developments and proximity to premium facilities including championship golf courses, exclusive beach clubs, and gourmet restaurants. This prime location offers the perfect balance between serene mountain living and Mediterranean coastal lifestyle, making it one of the most sought-after addresses in the Valencia region.
highlights: Elevated position with panoramic sea and mountain views
Walking distance to prestigious golf courses and country clubs
Easy access to Jávea's award-winning beaches and marinas
Close to fine dining restaurants and exclusive beach clubs
Peaceful residential area with luxury villa developments

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Lotus showcases exceptional architectural design with premium finishes throughout, featuring an intelligent layout that maximizes natural light and captures the stunning views from every angle. The property's contemporary aesthetic is complemented by high-end materials and cutting-edge technology.
features: 3 spacious bedrooms and 3 luxury bathrooms on the upper floor
Open-plan living, dining and fully equipped designer kitchen
Expansive terraces with direct access to landscaped gardens
Infinity-style swimming pool integrated into the landscape
Double garage with secure parking and storage space
Panoramic sea and mountain views from multiple rooms
Premium finishes and high-quality construction materials
Large 1000m² private plot with mature landscaping
Energy-efficient design with modern climate control
Private outdoor entertaining areas and poolside terraces

content.investmentSection:
Villa Lotus represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most prestigious coastal destinations. Jávea's luxury property market has shown consistent growth over the past decade, with premium villas in elevated positions commanding particular interest from international buyers. The Cap Martí area's limited development potential ensures exclusivity and long-term value appreciation.

The combination of stunning views, premium location, and high-quality construction makes Villa Lotus an ideal investment for both personal enjoyment and rental income potential. Luxury villas in this area achieve excellent rental yields during peak season, while the property's unique design and prime position ensure strong capital growth prospects in the competitive Costa Blanca luxury market.
whyBuySection: Exclusive elevated location with unobstructed sea and mountain views
Premium Cap Martí address in Jávea's most prestigious residential area
High-quality construction by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana
Generous 1000m² plot providing exceptional privacy and space
Walking distance to golf courses, beaches, and fine dining
Strong investment potential in proven luxury property market
Energy-efficient design with modern amenities and technology

faqs.question: What is the total price and are payment plans available for Villa Lotus?
faqs.answer: Villa Lotus is priced at €1,550,000. We can arrange flexible payment schedules and work with you to structure the purchase according to your requirements. Contact us to discuss payment options and timeline.

faqs.question: How close is Villa Lotus to Jávea's beaches and town center?
faqs.answer: Villa Lotus is located in Cap Martí, approximately 5-10 minutes drive to Jávea's beautiful beaches and town center. The elevated position provides privacy while maintaining convenient access to all amenities, restaurants, and recreational facilities.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international purchasers in Spain?
faqs.answer: We guide international buyers through the entire Spanish property purchase process, including NIE number application, legal documentation, and completion procedures. Our experienced team ensures a smooth transaction from initial viewing to final handover.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for Villa Lotus?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno and other leading mortgage providers to arrange competitive financing options for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of the property value for non-residents.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for Villa Lotus?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Cap Martí achieve excellent rental yields, particularly during peak summer months. The combination of sea views, premium location, and high-quality amenities makes Villa Lotus highly attractive to discerning holiday rental guests.

faqs.question: When will Villa Lotus be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: Villa Lotus is a new development by Miralbo Urbana. Please contact us for current completion timeline and availability. We provide regular updates throughout the construction process.

faqs.question: What is included in the Villa Lotus purchase price?
faqs.answer: The purchase includes the fully finished villa with premium fixtures and fittings, landscaped gardens, swimming pool, garage, and all integrated appliances. Full specification details are available upon request.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa Lotus?
faqs.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp at https://api.whatsapp.com/message/TISVZ2WXY7ERN1 or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange a private viewing. We can also provide virtual tours and detailed property presentations.

content.conclusion: Villa Lotus represents a rare opportunity to acquire a luxury residence in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations. With its exceptional design, premium finishes, and spectacular views, this property offers the ultimate in Mediterranean luxury living. Contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and discover why Villa Lotus is the perfect choice for discerning buyers seeking excellence in Jávea.
